3.8.3 -- 2020-06-08
-------------------

You can view the `3.8.3 milestone`_ on GitLab for more details.

Bugs Fixed
~~~~~~~~~~

- Also catch ``SyntaxError`` when tokenizing (See also `GitLab!433`_,
  `GitLab#662`_)

- Fix ``--jobs`` default display in ``flake8 --help`` (See also `GitLab!434`_,
  `GitLab#665`_)
